casebody.data:
Third Department,

August, 1968

(August 27, 1968)* In the Matter of John Wright, Petitioner, v. Albert Krakes, as Treasurer of the County of Essex, et al., Respondents.

Not published with other decisions of August, 1968, 30 A D 2d 919.— [Rep.

for an order to show cause and a writ of mandamus denied, without costs. Gibson, P. J., Herlihy, Aulisi, Staley, Jr., and Gabrielli, JJ., concur.
